0.92.name: wordpress/monthly-post-counter
0.92.description:
This plugin is obsolete, use the new Post Pay Counter instead. It does everything the Monthly Post Counter did, but better and with tons of new features. If you are updating, please consider uninstalling this and installing the new Post Pay Counter.

On a multi paid author blog, the Monthly Post Counter allows you to define how much each post must be paid for, basing on its length. For example, you can say that from 180 to 300 words you're giving 3 euros, and that posts with more that 30 comments will receive an additional bonus.

You can set up up to 5 zones, and the posts with less words than the lowest zone won't be counted. You can also choose whether you want pending for revision post to be counted or not. Posts planned for the future are included by default. For a
